Recipes

Grilled Honey-Teriyaki Chicken

Entrees

entrees, chicken

grilled-honey-teriyaki-chicken

Clark family recipe for Grilled Honey-Teriyaki Chicken.

null

null

null

6 8 chicken breast, brine: 2 cups water, brine: 1 cup light brown sugar, brine: 1/2 head garlic, unpeeled, brine: 4 slices fresh ginger root, brine: 2 TBS kosher salt, brine: 8 sprigs of thyme, glaze: 2 cups teriyaki sauce, glaze: 1/4 cup honey, glaze: 1 large (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root, glaze: 1 head garlic, cut in half

Make the brine by putting everything in a plastic bag., Add chicken and let it brine for 1 2 hours in refrigerator., Preheat grill to medium heat or you can do it in a grill pan., Add the chicken to a large mixing bowl and drizzle with olive oil, and pepper., Grill until done., Baste with teriyaki glaze for the last 5 minutes., Serve with Stir Fried Rice, GLAZE:, In a sm saucepan combine teriyaki sauce,, honey,ginger, garlic. Simmer until rich and slightly reduced.

Clark Family Collection
